Title: Four killed as lorry rams auto near Kovvuru in West Godavari dt.
Content: Four persons including two children died on the spot when a lorry fully loaded with gas cylinders hit an autorickshaw near Bangarampeta of Vadapalli after Kovvuru mandal headquarters on Thursday. Thr
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: Four persons including two children died on the spot when a lorry fully loaded with gas cylinders hit an autorickshaw near Bangarampeta of Vadapalli after Kovvuru mandal headquarters on Thursday. Thr
